title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather, document, and prioritize the requirements for the DroneDeliveryHub system. This includes functional and non-functional requirements, stakeholder needs, system constraints, regulatory compliance, integration with existing systems, and potential future scalability considerations. Additionally, outline any necessary interfaces between different components of the system, as well as performance metrics and security standards to ensure safe and efficient operation. Since this task involves a high level of architecture design, it is recommended to consider edge cases and failure scenarios for robustness and reliability. Furthermore, identify potential areas for machine learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) integration, with a focus on specific use-cases such as route optimization, predictive maintenance, and anomaly detection in the drone delivery process. Include any research or benchmarks that support the chosen approaches and ML/AI models, when applicable. Lastly, consider addressing the following questions: What are the key system architecture components? How will they interact with each other? How will data flow through the system? Are there any potential bottlenecks or areas of concern in terms of scalability or security? The task is now ready for review by the assigned team member. Please provide feedback and suggestions within this RFC document.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the DroneDeliveryHub system, including components, modules, and their interactions.

title: Develop Route Optimization Algorithm
description: Implement an algorithm to optimize delivery routes for drones, considering factors such as package weight, drone battery life, and air traffic.

title: Implement Air Traffic Management
description: Develop a system to manage air traffic for drones, ensuring safe and efficient flight paths and avoiding collisions.

title: Design and Develop User Interface
description: Create a user-friendly interface for customers to place orders, track deliveries, and manage their accounts.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the system is secure by implementing appropriate security measures, such as encryption, authentication, and access controls.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the DroneDeliveryHub system.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Test Cases
description: Create a comprehensive testing strategy and develop test cases to ensure the system meets all requirements and functions as expected.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Document the system architecture, API specifications, and user guides for the DroneDeliveryHub system.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement a database schema and data storage solution for the DroneDeliveryHub system.
